answers.answer: Avastin and its cousin Lucentis are one of the great advances in Ophthalmology in the last 20 years. For most cases doing nothing is much much more risky than the avastin injection.JCH MD

question: I recently had a blood vessel broke inside my right eye. My opthalmologist sent me to a retinal special specialist who suggest an injection of avastin into the eye. I am very concerned with all the side effects especially since Diabetes is very common on both sides of my family.The retinal specialist said there is a 1in 5 chance that it will clear up. Knowing the side effects, isn't the risk of having the injection too high for me to take knowing that i might not regain clear vision in my eye? Are there other alternatives for me to consider?
title: avastin
